cd0101_label: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I get the money?
cd0101: PLZ_TRANSLATE Just ask your supporters! They keep the money for you, just like a bank!
cd0102: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi keeps track of how much your supporters owe you. If you want your money, ask your supporters!
cd0201_label: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I pay with Gimi?
cd0201: PLZ_TRANSLATE You can't! You need to ask your supporters to pay for you.
cd0202: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi keeps track of how much your supporters owe you. If you want to pay, ask your supporters!
cd0301: PLZ_TRANSLATE That's the day you get your money!
cd0303_week: PLZ_TRANSLATE You need to wait for your money! It comes once a week
cd0303_month: PLZ_TRANSLATE You need to wait for your money! It comes once a month
cd0401_label: PLZ_TRANSLATE When do I get my money?
cd0401: PLZ_TRANSLATE You have %1$d days left until next payday!
cd0501_label: PLZ_TRANSLATE How much money have I earned?
cd0501: PLZ_TRANSLATE You've earned %1$d for next Payday!
cd0601_label: PLZ_TRANSLATE How can I earn more money?
cd0601: PLZ_TRANSLATE Hard work will earn you money! Do some chores?
cd0602: PLZ_TRANSLATE Ever tried doing something fun for work? Suggest a chore!
cd0701_label: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I buy my dream?
cd0701: PLZ_TRANSLATE You can't pay with Gimi, but you can ask your supporters to buy your dream for you!
cd0702: PLZ_TRANSLATE The money in your savings it what your supporters owe you!
cd0703: PLZ_TRANSLATE So if you saved up for your dream, they should pay for it!

cd0801_7: PLZ_TRANSLATE Becuase cyberspace is crazy today

cd1002: PLZ_TRANSLATE You still need %1$d to reach your dream!
cd1003: PLZ_TRANSLATE You can do it! I believe in you!

cd1102: PLZ_TRANSLATE But you can make a list of cravings!

cd1301_label: PLZ_TRANSLATE How many supporters can I have?
cd1301: PLZ_TRANSLATE As many as you want!
cd1401_label: PLZ_TRANSLATE Why are you a pig?
cd1401: PLZ_TRANSLATE Before digital money, people used coins.
cd1402: PLZ_TRANSLATE And children used to save their coins in porcelain pigs, piggybanks!
cd1403: PLZ_TRANSLATE ...and now money is online, so I'm here too, but made of pixels!
cd1501_label: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I pay with the Gimi card?
cd1501: PLZ_TRANSLATE That's easy! Want to pay in a store or online?
cd1502: PLZ_TRANSLATE First, make sure you have enough money on your card
cd1503: PLZ_TRANSLATE When you click "PAY", the store will ask for your card details
cd1504: PLZ_TRANSLATE Do you know where to find them in the app?
cd1505: PLZ_TRANSLATE OK! The cashier and they will tell you the price
cd1506: PLZ_TRANSLATE Make sure you have enough money on your card!
cd1507: PLZ_TRANSLATE Now, put the card in the terminal, and press your PIN.
cd1508: PLZ_TRANSLATE Just go to your card, and click "card details"
cd1509: PLZ_TRANSLATE Then type all these numbers in the correct fields, and you're done!
cd1510: PLZ_TRANSLATE Good! Then you're ready to pay!
cd1512: PLZ_TRANSLATE The PIN is the secret 4 digit code to your card
cd1513: PLZ_TRANSLATE You need it when you pay with the card!
cd1515: PLZ_TRANSLATE The terminal is the thingy you put your card in when you pay in a store.
cd1517: PLZ_TRANSLATE You can learn more about paying here!
cd1518: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you forget your PIN, you can see it in the app!
cd1601_label: PLZ_TRANSLATE How do I get money on the card?
cd1601: PLZ_TRANSLATE Do you have money in your savings account?
cd1602: PLZ_TRANSLATE Good! You can now transfer money from savings to your card
